content.query:
-- CETAS - Create external table as select statement this will create an external table as well as parquet file in container 
use tushar_db
GO

create external table silver.nyc_taxi_Data_1
 with (
    data_source =  nyc_taxi_src,
    location = 'Silver/taxi_zone_data_1',
    file_format = parquet_file_format
    )
    as 
    select * from bronze.taxi_zone;


select * from tushar_db.silver.nyc_taxi_Data


--
